trends: There have been no other sightings in tobyhana
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Detailsdriving home from doctors my girlfriend noticed a silver shaped object flying along side of us.she told me to look over there there was a ufo.At first when i looked over i didn,t see anything.she said keep looking it went behind a tree line.Sure enough as soon as the tree line opend up there was a silve or peuter object egg shaped just hovering a bout a quaterof amile above the tree line.It sat there hovering there people in the car in front of us slowed down and were looking up at the same object there were no windows doors or engines and no sound comming from the object.it felt like we were being observed i told my girlfriend to keep going.Itried to repot it last year but the web sight wouldn,t take it
Summary: beat up sivler or peuter egg shaped object that looked ancient very old looking
